prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.

spanGrp.span: The prophet Moses, peace be upon him, he was traveling in the country, and he came to a house, he became a guest in the house there
When he arrived in that house, he looked at this house and found that it was a rich house, which had a lot of money, a house like no other in the surroundings, it was the best
He knocked the door and said “I want to be their guest here, let me say, I want to stay here today”
But he looked at the house, there was no response (literally there was no sound or breath)
When he knocked the door on them, they came out. The housekeeper came out to him and said to him “Come in!”
He came and sat inside “Peace be upon you, peace be upon you too”
He said “I see that your house is a good house in this neighborhood, the best house
But there is no sound or breath, I did not see any children, little children, anything”
They said: “Well, prophet Moses, God has not given us any children, we have been married for ten years, we have no children
We do not sons, we do not have daughters
And you prophet Moses, ask your God, maybe he would give us children, that is what we really want”
He said “Give me the pot, the pot, I want to perform ablution”
He took the pot, went out to the open field and performed ablution, then he started to pray
After he prayed, he opened his hands to his God and said “Dear God, with your glory and majesty, give to this house children
So they have children, to be happy” God did not answer him
And prophet Moses, when the prophets do not get any answer, they do not ask God again
He came back to the house, they looked at him, the housekeeper looked at prophet Moses how he did not get any answer
He said “Since God did not give me any answer, he (somehow) answered that he did not give us”
And prophet Moses went out of that house and left
Time passed, some days or some weeks, someone else came to this house
He came and greeted, and they greeted back, he said “I see that your house…” He was not a prophet, a boy had come to them, this was not a prophet, someone from the neighborhood
He said “I see that you do not have children, you do not have children, you do not have children”
They said “Well, we do not” – “Why?” he said – “God did not give us, so we have not got children”.
“So, did not you go to a doctor, did not you go somewhere?”
He said “No! Prophet Moses came to us and we told him ‘O, prophet Moses’”
Smāˁīn, do you know this one? Have you told it before?
They said to him “and we said to prophet Moses, and prophet Moses went asking from his God, and since God did not give him an answer, prophet Moses did not say anything to us, left and went away”
He said “So, it was like that” He said “Yes, like that” He said “Give me the pot”
He took the pot, after he had taken the pot, he went performing ablution and prayed. After he had prayed
he stood on the pray and prayed, after he had prayed, he took a bottle out of his pocket, something like a bottle, a canister, he took out of his pocket
He opened his hand (to his hand) to his God, and said “My God, you either give them children, to these, or I will hit the ground with this bottle right now and ruin the earth and the skies”
God sent him a message and said “Stop, my servant, I have given them, and you, do not hit with this bottle!”
This came back to the house, they made a dinner or lunch for him, they made lunch, dinner for him
“What did you do?” He said “You will have (children) do not worry! The pray worked” and went out and left. These did not accept it, I mean, the first one was a prophet and this one is someone else
Indeed, time passed. When time passed, these got children
After the first-born child, they got another one, and after this one they became a lot
Every year the woman was giving birth. Time come, time go (after a while= Day in, day out) prophet Moses came again to this house
When prophet Moses had arrived, he looked at this house, how it was full of children
Where did these children come from? Did they sell the house?
Did someone else come? What is it? He came and knocked the door of the house again
But a long time had passed, ten year, fifteen years had passed
When the woman came out, here it was the (same) woman
They knew that prophet Moses had arrived, “Prophet Moses, come in!” He said
When they told him “Come on!” He sat and said “Whose children are these?”
They said “These children are ours” He said “You have got children?” They said “Yes, we have got children.
God gave us. I was giving birth every year, and our children have become a lot”
Prophet Moses was astonished, started to perform ablution, prayed and opened his hand to his God
saying “My God, with your glory and majesty, I prayed to you at the beginning, but they did not get children, why do they have got children now?”
God sent him a message this time. He said to him “Prophet Moses, one of my people came to me and I did not disappoint him and I gave him children”
He said “My God, some of your people came in here?” He said “Yes, from my people”
He said “My God, I wonder, do you have people?” He said “Prophet Moses, the way you have people, so do I have people, I have (close) people too”
“How do you have people?” – “I also have people” He said “My God, I want to get to know your people
lead me to them, lead me to them, so I go and meet them. I want to go to meet them, I insist, I want to get to know them, who these your people are.
Your people are that close to you, we, I am a prophet from God, and that guy is something else, you did not accept my prayer, but you did his
And he took out a bottle from his pocket, he wanted to hit the earth and ruin it. Who are these?”
He said “Prophet, prophet Moses. You cannot get those. These are many people, high-ranked people
He said “My God, I still want to get to know them” He said “If you are so self-confident about yourself
go to that place, on that mountain, behind that mountain there, there are seven tents, in those seven tents are my people”
Prophet Moses took his stick and left. When he left, when he arrived from above the back of the mountain, and he wanted to see the tents
The tents were installed, seven tents. Those (they) came out from the tents
When they came out from the tents, they saw that someone was coming from the back side, they saw him, people of the tents
Everyone was riding on his horse, and heading to prophet Moses, everyone was saying “This is my guest” Everyone was saying “This is my guest, he wants to stay at my place, in my house”
And they were coming running towards prophet Moses. When they were coming to prophet Moses, prophet Moses looked around
Those people there were coming to him, what is up with them? What is the matter?
When they had arrived, everyone was saying “O, prophet Moses, you are in my house!”
But they did not know him that he was a prophet, just like that. That one was saying “That is my guest” That one was saying “That is my guest”
until they gathered around and pulled the swords on each other in the end
They wanted to hit each other for the guest. He said “People, stop! A fight does not settle it!” “How should we do it?”
He said “Sir, blindfold my eyes and take me so I walk, where I point with my hand to whose house
I stay as a guest in that house”
They said “Alright, highly agreed, get up and blindfold his eyes” and they left at the houses
Prophet Moses looked and looked until he grabbed the hand of that door and said “I am a guest here, in this house” He stayed then in that house
The house’s people were happy. “Today this guest is at our place”. The house’s people sat, the housekeeper, and he had something
He said to him “What would our guest like to eat, so we can make food for him, food”
Prophet Moses said “I…” They said “So we can slaughter a sheep for you, we slaughter a sheep for you, we slaughter a cow for you, we slaughter for you, what would you like?”
He said “I eat human flesh, I eat human flesh”
“Human flesh?” He said “Human flesh!” The housekeep got up, got his mother and put her to the floor
He pulled the knife and wanted to cut his mother, to kill her. His wife came in
and said to him “O, housekeeper, what are you doing?” He said “I want to kill my mother, so we can make her for the guest, for the guest”
She said “Now if you kill your mother, she has relatives, her relatives will come saying why did you kill our woman?
Kill me! Because you are my man!” He said “You are right, your words are right”
He got up, left his mother, grabbed his wife, put her on the floor and picked the knife. He wanted to cut her head.
His son came in just in time, son of that house, and said to him “Father, what are you doing?”
He said “Son, I want to kill your mother, so I can make her for the guest”
He said “Father, alright, you did not kill my grandmother, she has relatives, but my mother also has relatives
They will also put you in jail. Kill me. No one will judge you about me but only God!”
He said “You words are more agreed on” He got up, left his wife, grabbed his son and put his little son to the floor
When he put him down, he grabbed the knife and wanted to cut his head. Prophet Moses came to him
He said “What are you doing?” He said “I want to slaughter my son for you!
He said “Is not this for me?” He said “Yes, I want to slaughter this for you, for you to eat him”
He said “Maybe I get shy in front of you, I can not eat, what comes to your guest
give him to me, I want to take him to the mountain there, cut and eat him, and come back”
He said “Here you are” He gave him his son, and prophet Moses took him, grabbed him from his hand and took him, and they left
Prophet Moses brought him, and they arrived in the head of the mountain, went ahead and sat, him and the boy
The boy was bowing down, so prophet Moses could kill him. He said to him “Kid, come let’s play, you and me!”
He said “What do we play, prophet Moses?” He said “Let’s play hide-and-seek (qubb¬ēya)!” “Yes” He said “Alright, let’s play!”
Prophet Moses said “Close your eyes, kid! I want to hide!”
The boy went ahead and closed his eyes, and prophet Moses hid himself. After he had hidden himself, prophet Moses, prophet Moses
the boy opened his eyes, he looked in the seven skies, prophet Moses was not there, he looked in the earth, prophet Moses was not there
He looked to his left, he was not there, to the west, he was not there, to the qibla (where the kaaba is), he was not there, to the east, he was not there
When he looked in the seven seas down, he found prophet Moses behind a rock above the carp sticking to it and hiding.
The boy called prophet Moses saying “Prophet Moses, you broke the carp’s back! Enough! Come out!” He found prophet Moses
Prophet Moses came out. The boy said “Prophet Moses, it is my turn, I want to hide and you find me!”
Prophet Moses closed his eyes and the boy hid. Prophet Moses opened his eyes and looked
in the seven skies, nothing, seven earths, nothing, seven seas, nothing
He looked to the left, nothing, to the qible nothing, to the west, nothing, the boy was not there anymore, gone
He went ahead and said “Come out, kid, I did not find you! Where are you, you are nowhere, I have looked everywhere”
He said “Prophet Moses, I have become a hair in your mustache, here I am!”
He became a hair in his mustache, and there he was, and he came out as a hair in his mustache
“Ah” He said to him “Kid, go away! I can not beat you, your rank must be high, higher than mine, and I cannot keep up with you”
He left him and went away, prophet Moses, then he left them and went away then. The boy went to his parents
running, and they saw that he was alive, he (they) said « What happened there ? » He said « Well, we did this and that
and this is God’s prophet, this is prophet Moses » and he went away and left them. These are God’s people, God’s people
They worship God, and they do not know anything else but God, they only know God, they only know God’s sake
They do not have anything else, neither the world’s pleasures nor anything else, by God’s will, maybe nowadays, there is also something, I do not know – God bless you !
